verses.name: Isaiah 5:17
verses.text: Then shall the lambs feed after their manner, and the waste places of the fat ones shall strangers eat.

verses.name: Isaiah 5:18
verses.text: Woe unto them that draw iniquity with cords of vanity, and sin as it were with a cart rope:

verses.name: Isaiah 5:19
verses.text: That say, Let him make speed, and hasten his work, that we may see it: and let the counsel of the Holy One of Israel draw nigh and come, that we may know it!

verses.name: Isaiah 5:20
verses.text: Woe unto them that call evil good, and good evil; that put darkness for light, and light for darkness; that put bitter for sweet, and sweet for bitter!
